mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, user_pass, user_fullname, user_gender, user_birthday, user_address, user_phone, user_email, user_created_date, user_updated_date
mapper.insert:
insert into tbluser
user_name,
user_pass,
user_fullname,
user_gender,
user_birthday,
user_address,
user_phone,
user_email,
user_created_date,
user_updated_date,

#{userFullname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tbluser
user_name = #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pass = #{userPass, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_fullname = #{userFullname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_gender = #{userGender, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_birthday = #{userBirthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_address = #{userAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_email = #{userEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_updated_date = now(),
where user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INT}
